text: Alloh taolo daruni hec marde du qalʙ ʙarojas nanihodaast va [ʙa hamin surat] hargiz hamsaronatonro ki mavridi zihor [va tahrimi cinsi] qaror medihed, [hamcun] modaronaton nagardondaast; va [hamcunin] pisarxondahojatonro pisaronaton nasoxtaast. In suxani [nodurust] ast, ki ʙar zaʙon meovared va Alloh taolo haqro megujad va Ust, ki ʙa rohi rost hidojat mekunad
